metadata.title: CVE-2023-37204 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the fullscreen notification by using anoption element by introducing lag via an expensive computational function.This could have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
